Well, actually you won't see much of a web site in the beginning. It's mostly that my images will be hosted under "manessinger.com" (existing but completely devoid of content yet). I still have to find a solution for the big sizes, something like on SmugMug, that displays the biggest size that fits the viewer's screen would be nice, but maybe I go with all static content in the beginning. We'll see.
